item.title: How I got a 100 Dollar toy drone to follow me around.
item.description: It’s that time of the year again when I decide to add to my blog. It was my birthday last week and I decided to buy myself a small DJI drone to hack with. I wanted to get something lightweight, cheap and easily replaced. The DJI Tello so far has turned out to be delightfully sufficient for my criteria. The experiment I set out to do is to have the Tello latch on to a face and follow it.
